articles.author: Catie Keck
articles.title: Travelex Reportedly Paid Ransomware Hackers 285 Bitcoin Worth Over $2 Million
articles.description: Following a ransomware attack against foreign exchange company Travelex earlier this year, the company reportedly paid a hefty, multimillion-dollar sum to hackers in the form of hundreds of bitcoin. Read more...
articles.content:
Following a ransomware attack against foreign exchange company Travelex earlier this year, the company reportedly paid a hefty, multimillion-dollar sum to hackers in the form of hundreds of bitcoin.

articles.title: WSJ: Travelex paid ransomware ring $2.3 million
